# Research Report: Claude Code Skills for Next.js Mythology Educational Website
Generated: 2026-02-04

## Executive Summary

There is a rich ecosystem of Claude Code skills available that would significantly benefit the Mythos mythology educational website. Key findings include official Vercel skills for React/Next.js best practices, comprehensive SEO skills for educational content optimization, accessibility testing skills for inclusive design, and specialized content management tools. The most relevant skills come from verified sources like Vercel Engineering, Anthropic, and community-maintained repositories.

## Research Question

Search for relevant Claude Code skills that could help with a Next.js mythology educational website covering:
1. Frontend/React/Next.js skills
2. SEO optimization skills
3. Performance skills
4. Testing skills
5. Content management skills
6. Image optimization skills
7. Accessibility skills

---

## Key Findings

### 1. Frontend/React/Next.js Skills

#### Official Vercel Skills (Highest Priority)
| Skill | Repository | Description | Relevance to Mythos |
|-------|------------|-------------|---------------------|
| **react-best-practices** | [vercel-labs/agent-skills](https://github.com/vercel-labs/agent-skills/tree/main/skills/react-best-practices) | 40+ rules across 8 categories for React optimization | Core framework patterns |
| **next-best-practices** | [vercel-labs/next-skills](https://github.com/vercel-labs/next-skills/tree/main/skills/next-best-practices) | Next.js recommended patterns | App Router optimization |
| **next-cache-components** | [vercel-labs/next-skills](https://github.com/vercel-labs/next-skills/tree/main/skills/next-cache-components) | Caching strategies and cache-aware components | Performance for deity pages |
| **composition-patterns** | [vercel-labs/agent-skills](https://github.com/vercel-labs/agent-skills/tree/main/skills/composition-patterns) | React component composition patterns | Reusable mythology components |
| **web-design-guidelines** | [vercel-labs/agent-skills](https://github.com/vercel-labs/agent-skills/tree/main/skills/web-design-guidelines) | Web design standards | Consistent visual design |

**Installation:**
```bash
npx add-skill vercel-labs/agent-skills
npx add-skill vercel-labs/next-skills
```

#### Community Next.js Skills
| Skill | Repository | Description | Impact |
|-------|------------|-------------|--------|
| **claude-nextjs-skills** | [wsimmonds/claude-nextjs-skills](https://github.com/wsimmonds/claude-nextjs-skills) | Improved Next.js eval scores from 32% to 78% | Proven Next.js patterns |
| **nextjs skill** | [jezweb/claude-skills](https://github.com/jezweb/claude-skills/tree/main/skills/nextjs) | Next.js 16, React 19.2, 65-70% token savings | Modern patterns, error prevention |

- Source: [awesome-agent-skills](https://github.com/VoltAgent/awesome-agent-skills) - 202+ verified skills

---

### 2. SEO Optimization Skills

#### Dedicated SEO Skills (High Priority for Educational Content)
| Skill | Repository | Description | Relevance to Mythos |
|-------|------------|-------------|---------------------|
| **claude-code-seo** | [huifer/claude-code-seo](https://github.com/huifer/claude-code-seo) | 100-point scoring across 6 dimensions, 27+ commands | Comprehensive SEO for mythology content |
| **seo-audit** | [coreyhaines31/marketingskills](https://github.com/coreyhaines31/marketingskills) | Technical and on-page SEO audit | Mythology page optimization |
| **programmatic-seo** | [coreyhaines31/marketingskills](https://github.com/coreyhaines31/marketingskills) | Scaled page generation with templates | Auto-generate deity/story pages |
| **schema-markup** | [coreyhaines31/marketingskills](https://github.com/coreyhaines31/marketingskills) | Structured data optimization | Rich results for mythology entities |
| **seo-aeo-best-practices** | [sanity-io/agent-toolkit](https://github.com/sanity-io/agent-toolkit/tree/main/skills/seo-aeo-best-practices) | SEO and answer engine optimization | Educational content visibility |

**claude-code-seo Features:**
- Metadata optimization (Title, Description, OG, Twitter Cards)
- Structured data generation and validation
- E-E-A-T authority building (Experience, Expertise, Authoritativeness, Trust)
- Content strategy (Pillar Pages, Topic Clusters)
- Local SEO and internationalization

**Installation:**
```bash
git clone https://github.com/huifer/claude-code-seo.git ~/.claude/plugins/claude-seo-assistant
npx skills add coreyhaines31/marketingskills --skill seo-audit programmatic-seo schema-markup
```

| Skill | Repository | Description | Relevance to Mythos |
|-------|------------|-------------|---------------------|

| **next-upgrade** | [vercel-labs/next-skills](https://github.com/vercel-labs/next-skills/tree/main/skills/next-upgrade) | Upgrade Next.js versions | Keep framework current |

**Installation:**
```bash
/plugin marketplace add anthropics/skills
/plugin marketplace add obra/superpowers
```

### 5. Accessibility Skills

- Screen reader compatibility (NVDA/JAWS/VoiceOver)
- Keyboard navigation
- Cognitive accessibility
- WCAG compliance validation

## Recommended Installation Plan

### Priority 1: Core Development (Install First)
```bash
# Vercel official skills
npx add-skill vercel-labs/agent-skills
npx add-skill vercel-labs/next-skills

# Anthropic official skills
/plugin marketplace add anthropics/skills
```

### Priority 2: SEO & Content
```bash
# SEO assistant
git clone https://github.com/huifer/claude-code-seo.git ~/.claude/plugins/claude-seo-assistant

# Marketing skills for SEO
npx skills add coreyhaines31/marketingskills --skill seo-audit programmatic-seo schema-markup content-strategy
```

### Priority 3: Quality & Testing
```bash
# Superpowers for TDD and debugging
/plugin marketplace add obra/superpowers

# Platform design for accessibility
git clone https://github.com/ehmo/platform-design-skills.git ~/.claude/skills/platform-design-skills
```

### Priority 4: Content & Media
```bash
# Content management
/plugin install marketing-skills@claude-code-skills

# Image optimization
git clone https://github.com/alonw0/web-asset-generator.git ~/.claude/skills/web-asset-generator
```

---

## Recommendations

### For Mythos Mythology Website Specifically:

1. **Immediate Value**
   - Install **vercel-labs/react-best-practices** and **next-best-practices** - these directly improve React/Next.js code quality
   - Install **claude-code-seo** - comprehensive SEO with structured data for mythology entities

2. **Content Enhancement**
   - Use **programmatic-seo** to generate templated pages for each deity, story, and pantheon
   - Apply **schema-markup** for rich results (educational content, articles, FAQs)
   - Use **content-strategy** for topic cluster planning (Greek mythology pillar page linking to individual deity pages)

3. **Quality Assurance**
   - **webapp-testing** with Playwright for deity page testing, quiz functionality
   - **accessibility-tester** for WCAG compliance on educational content

4. **Performance**
   - **next-cache-components** for caching mythology data (deities.json is relatively static)
   - **web-perf** for Core Web Vitals on image-heavy deity galleries

5. **Design Consistency**
   - **frontend-design** to avoid generic AI aesthetics
   - **ui-design-system** for consistent design tokens across mythology UI

---

## Open Questions

1. **Sanity CMS Integration**: Would migrating from JSON to Sanity CMS benefit content management? The **sanity-best-practices** skill would enable this.

2. **Image Generation**: Should AI image generation skills (fal.ai) be used to create additional deity artwork, or keep using existing assets?

3. **Internationalization**: For mythology content in multiple languages, additional i18n skills may be needed.

4. **Quiz Testing**: The quiz component may benefit from specialized testing patterns not covered by general webapp-testing.
